mapper.select: select hid, h_name, h_infor, h_infor2, h_tag, h_addr, h_vpoint, h_hpoint, h_hp, h_like, h_img from myjeju_house
select hid, h_name, h_tag, h_infor, h_like, h_img from (select hid, h_name, h_tag, h_infor, h_like, h_img from myjeju_house order by h_like desc) where rownum <= 3
select hid, h_name, h_tag, h_infor, h_infor2, h_addr, h_hp, h_like, h_img from myjeju_house where hid = #{hid}
select hd_name, hd_price, hd_people, hd_img, hdid, hid from myjeju_hdetail where hid = #{hid}
mapper.insert: delete from myjeju_heart where id=#{id} and hid=#{hid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from myjeju_heart where id=#{id} and hid=#{hid}
mapper.update: update myjeju_house set h_like = h_like+1 where hid=#{hid}
update myjeju_house set h_like = h_like-1 where hid=#{hid}
